other_tests.findings: Amniotic fluid karyotype was 46,XY, add(18)(p11.2), indicating the presence of additional material on the short arm of chromosome 18 at band 11.2.
The mother's karyotype showed a balanced translocation 46,XX,t(1;18)(q42.1;p11.2). The fetus had an unbalanced translocation.
Abnormal material on the short arm of chromosome 18.
Found a left ovarian endometriotic cyst, which was excised.
Identified three chromosomally balanced embryos and four chromosomally unbalanced embryos.
